data.title: 'Demon Slayer' Season 3 To Have 70 Minutes Long Finale? Check Release Date, What To Expect And Recap
meta_keywords: Demon Slayer Season 3 Episode 10 release date
Demon Slayer Season 3 episode 11 time duration
data.meta_description: 'Demon Slayer Season 3' will have 11 episodes in total. The finale will release on June 18 on Netflix and Crunchyroll.
data.text:
JE Entertainment Desk: The popular anime 'Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba' is heading towards its finale and all the episodes have successfully kept the audience at the edge of their seats. The makers have finally announced the release date, time and episode length of the 'Demon Slayer Season 3' finale.

Demon Slayer Season 3 Finale:

The makers have confirmed that 'Demon Slayer Season 3' Episode 11 or Finale will release on June 18 on Netflix and Crunchyroll and will be 70 minutes long. The episode length is usually 20 to 30 minutes but the finale will be more than one hour long. Moreover, the episode has been titled 'No Matter How Many Lives’ and it will be interesting to see how our heroes will survive the demon attacks and save the villagers.

The show is available in 10 subtitles -- English, Spanish, Castilian, Portuguese, French, German, Italian, Arabic, Russian, and Hindi on Crunchyroll.

Demon Slayer Season 3: Episode 10 Recap

The Demon Slayer manage to evacuate the villagers to save them from demons. Meanwhile, Mitsuri makes an entry and the viewers saw her back story and powerful fighting technique. The episode also showed a glimpse of Mitsuri's romantic interest in Obanai but left the viewers on a cliffhanger.

Demon Slayer Season 3: Plot

It revolves around Tanjiro Kamado, whose family gets killed by demons and his only surviving sister, Nezuku, has turned into a demon. To avenge the death of his family and turn his sister back into a human, he joins the Demon Slayer Corps.

The synopsis reads: "Tanjiro’s journey leads him to the Swordsmith Village, where he reunites with two Hashira, members of the Demon Slayer Corps’ highest-ranking swordsmen – Mist Hashira Muichiro Tokito and Love Hashira Mitsuri Kanroji. With the shadows of demons lurking near, a new battle begins for Tanjiro and his comrades."

Demon Slayer Season 3: Voice Cast

The voice cast is -- Hanae Natsuki as Kamado Tanjiro, Kito Akari as Kamado Nezuko, Shimono Hiro as Agatsuma Zenitsu, Matsuoka Yoshitsugu as Hashibira Inosuke, Kawanishi Kengo as Tokito Muichiro, Hanazawa Kana as Kanroji Mitsuri, Okamoto Nobuhiko as Genya, Furukawa Toshio as Hantengu and Toriumi Kousuke as Gyokko.
